advancements.rpg_series.obtain_wizard_ro: Acquire a full set of Wizard Robes
advancements.rpg_series.spell_cast_arcan: Cast a spell from the Arcane Tome
Cast a spell with an Arcane Wand
advancements.rpg_series.spell_cast_fire_: Cast a spell from the Fire Tome
Cast a spell with a Fire Wand
advancements.rpg_series.spell_cast_frost: Cast a spell from the Frost Tome
Cast a spell with a Frost Wand
advancements.rpg_series.spell_novice_arc: Obtain your first Arcane Wizard Spell
advancements.rpg_series.spell_novice_fir: Obtain your first Fire Wizard Spell
advancements.rpg_series.spell_novice_fro: Obtain your first Frost Wizard Spell
advancements.rpg_series.trade_with_wizar: Trade with a Wizard Merchant villager
effect.wizards.frost_shield.description: Blocks incoming attacks while active, but slows down movement
effect.wizards.frozen.description: Prevents movement, removed upon taking damage, vulnerable to frost magic
spell.wizards.arcane_beam.description: Channels a beam of energy, dealing {damage} arcane damage every second. Consumes all Arcane Charges.
spell.wizards.arcane_beam.name: Arcane Beam
spell.wizards.arcane_blast.description: Blasts the target, causing {damage} arcane damage. Grants Arcane Charge, stacking up to {effect_amplifier_cap} times.
spell.wizards.arcane_blast.name: Arcane Blast
spell.wizards.arcane_blink.name: Blink
spell.wizards.arcane_bolt.description: Shoots a bolt of energy, causing {damage} arcane spell damage.
spell.wizards.arcane_bolt.name: Arcane Bolt
spell.wizards.arcane_missile.description: Continuously shoots bolts of energy piercing thru {pierce} targets, causing {damage} arcane damage every second.
spell.wizards.arcane_missile.name: Arcane Missiles
spell.wizards.fire_blast.description: Launches an explosive ball of fire, causing up to {damage} fire spell damage in {impact_range} blocks radius.
spell.wizards.fire_blast.name: Pyroblast
spell.wizards.fire_breath.description: Incinerates targets in front, dealing up to {damage} fire spell damage every second.
spell.wizards.fire_breath.name: Fire Breath
spell.wizards.fire_meteor.description: Crashes a meteors on the target, each causing up to {damage} fire spell damage within {impact_range} blocks.
spell.wizards.fire_meteor.name: Meteor
spell.wizards.fire_scorch.description: Scorches the target, causing {damage} fire spell damage and setting it on fire.
spell.wizards.fire_scorch.name: Scorch
spell.wizards.fire_wall.description: Creates a wall of fire, lasting {cloud_duration} seconds, dealing up to {damage} fire spell damage continuously to enemies passing thru.
spell.wizards.fire_wall.name: Wall of Flames
spell.wizards.fireball.description: Launches an ball of fire, causing up to {damage} fire spell and setting the target on fire.
spell.wizards.fireball.name: Fireball
spell.wizards.frost_blizzard.description: Channels a rain of frost shards down onto your target and nearby enemies, dealing up to {damage} frost spell damage slowing the target, in {impact_range} blocks radius.
spell.wizards.frost_blizzard.name: Blizzard
spell.wizards.frost_nova.description: Freezes targets around you for {effect_duration} seconds, causing {damage} frost spell damage and blocking their movement. Frozen targets are vulnerable to frost magic.
spell.wizards.frost_nova.name: Frost Nova
spell.wizards.frost_shard.description: Launches a frost shard that may bounce of walls, causing {damage} frost spell damage on impact.
spell.wizards.frost_shard.name: Frost Shard
spell.wizards.frost_shield.description: Protects you from attacks, projectiles and fire for {effect_duration} seconds, but also slows down your movement.
spell.wizards.frost_shield.name: Frost Shield
spell.wizards.frostbolt.description: Launches a ball of frost ricocheting to {ricochet} additional nearby targets, causing {damage} frost spell damage and slowing the target on impact.
spell.wizards.frostbolt.name: Frostbolt
